summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5128 for the improvement of Bennett Street, (both side), from 46th Avenue South to 47th Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing concrete sidewalks together with all necessary crosswalks; providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 59154, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
